featured.text: A man learns their secret and threatens to sell the water to the highest bidder.

other.text: 35 , they cannot be detected by other animals that threaten them.

definition.zh_def: 威脅，對某人或某事造成危險或損害的行為。
definition.en_def: To express an intention to cause harm or danger to someone or something.
definition.example: He threatened to quit if his demands were not met.
